short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show upcoming birthdays of your Twitter friends.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never miss your Twitter friends birthday ever again!

We know you spend most of your time on Twitter, which is why I decided to build this extension.

TwitterBday will show upcoming birthdays of your Twitter friends.

This extension is not affiliated with Twitter.
